title: Typescript Linter Task configuration
description: Defines configuration options for the tslint tool

lintConfig.description: A TsLint configuration object, options are from https://github.com/palantir/tslint#configuration

rulesDirectory.description: Directories to search for custom linter rules

sourceMatch.description: An array of file selectors (glob syntax) which the linter should analyze

displayAsWarning.description: If true, displays warnings as errors. If the reporter function is overwritten, it should reference this flag. Defaults to `false`.

removeExistingRules.description: If true, the lintConfig rules which were previously set will be removed. This flag is useful for ensuring that there are no rules activated from previous calls to setConfig(). Default is 'false'.

useDefaultConfigAsBase.description: If false, does not use a default tslint configuration as the basis for creating the list of active rules. Defaults to 'true'
